category.name: wcf.acp.option
category.item: Here you can adjust the IDENTIFY command to match the one of your server. Example: /msg NickServ IDENTIFY

category.name: wcf.user.option
category.item: Here you can enter your IRC-Username.
Here you can enter an alternate IRC-Username, which will be used if your specified Username is taken.
Here you can enter your IRC-Password. Note: The administrator has the ability to see the password.

Here you can specify an IRC-Command which will be executed after connecting to the Server.
Example: /mode Username +x
